lead_paragraph: Stocks around the world rose after Europe’s central bank announced a plan to shore up that region’s economy. The euro fell against the dollar.
snippet: Stocks around the world rose after Europe’s central bank announced a plan to shore up that region’s economy. The euro fell against the dollar.

headline.main: Market Closes Up After E.C.B. Announces Stimulus Plan
headline.print_headline: Market Closes Up After E.C.B. Announces Stimulus Plan
